title: Two Make Twins
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 296 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 520L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and O
description: Twins may look similar or enjoy the same things, but every twin is a unique individual. Two Make Twins introduces students to the different types of twins and the special bond they share. This book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text. The book and lesson are also available for levels L and O.
reviewWords: bond, face, fraternal twins, identical twins, opposite, twins
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast ideas
grammar: Subject-Verb Agreement                : Recognize and use subject-verb agreement
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
